attributes.action: make the sale of fireworks to the general public illegal
attributes.additional_details:
Fireworks should only be allowed in professionally controlled, council approved public firework shows. 

Animals are loosing their lifes to them, it was their world first we have just invaded it and now this is how we treat them, it is unfair.

The environment is also suffering abuse whilst the use of fireworks are still in use the way they are. It’s not necessary harm. We don’t need fireworks to live, we need the world to live
attributes.background: i believe sale of fireworks to the general public should be illegal and the noise to be reduced from 120cba to 90cba as there is too much distress caused to animals and people with anxiety.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for similar action: 

"Limit the sale of fireworks to those running local council approved events only" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732559

"Reduce the maximum noise level for consumer fireworks from 120 to 90 decibels"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/738192
